Cost Analysis of Consignment wise (Sundry, LTL, FTL and ODC)

Also responsible for overall operational activities.

Fleet and Traffic Control.

Entire Milk Run activity.

materials.

To ensure excess quantity should not be accumulated at line haul.

Genratation of M.I.S, Such as Stock Report, & vehicle performance report
